donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT
outputs.output_descr: The UNDP component of the MDG-Fund Joint Programme (JP) "Creating opportunities for Youth Employment in Sudan" supports policy advice, labour market surveys, business idea competitions including micro-grants, livelihoods fairs as well as ASCA-training for rural youth in the six selected states and works in close collaboration with the Microfinance Units of the Central Bank of Sudan and the Bank of Southern Sudan, the Ministry of Cooperatives and Rural Development (North Sudan), the Ministry of Commerce, Trade and Supply (South Sudan) as well as the other participating agencies and UNDAF partners aiming to provide skills development and livelihood opportunities to the youth with particular attention to migrant youth, including returnees and demobilised soldiers.

project_descr: UN Joint Programme on Creating Opportunities for Youth Employment in South Sudan
project_title: Support to Youth Employment in Southern Sudan
